headline: DA Davidson Reiterates Buy rating on Adobe (ADBE) amid AI Growth Prospects
summary: Adobe Inc. (NASDAQ:ADBE) is one of the 12 best augmented reality stocks to buy, according to analysts. On June 21, DA Davidson reiterated a ‘Buy’ rating and a $500 price target on the stock. The bullish stance comes from the research firm meeting with the company’s management team. Following the meeting, the research firm reiterated […]
